name: Tetris Slots
description:
Controls:

Mouse - Click and Drag

In Tetris Slots, fill slots by strategically placing tetris-shaped tiles on a grid. Get points by clearing slots in this turn-based tetris game, with placing a set of tiles being considered as 1 turn. Fill whole rows/columns to trigger combos, and level up to unlock and obtain more skills! Can you beat your own high score?
